comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do no edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: mv_pseries_weighted_sum
description: Converts a multivalued expression into a single valued column containing the weighted sum applying the P series function.

params.name: p
params.description: It is the P parameter of the P series function. It a constant number that define how the P series function grow. It impacts every element contribution in the weighted sum.

examples:
ROW data = [70.0, 45.0, 21.0, 21.0, 21.0]
| EVAL score = MV_P_SERIES_WEIGHTED_SUM(data, 1.5)
| KEEP score
